sources.title: Scott of the Antarctic
sources.description: The true story of the British explorer Robert Falcon Scott and his ill-fated expedition to try to be the first man to discover the South Pole, only to find that the murderously cold weather and a rival team of Norwegian explorers conspire against him.

metadata.Plot: The true story of the British explorer Robert Falcon Scott and his ill-fated expedition to try to be the first man to discover the South Pole, only to find that the murderously cold weather and a rival team of Norwegian explorers conspire against him.
metadata.Writer: Walter Meade, Ivor Montagu, Mary Hayley Bell
metadata.Actors: John Mills, Derek Bond, Diana Churchill
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award2 nominations total
